grantAccess(bytes32,bytes4,address).details: Can only be called by an authorized account.

params.account: address of the account to grant access to
params.methodSignature: function / method signature (4 byte keccak256 hash of the method selector)

params.account: address of the account for which to check access
params.methodSignature: function / method signature (4 byte keccak256 hash of the method selector)

params.account: address of the account for which to check root acccess

revokeAccess(bytes32,bytes4,address).details: Can only be called by an authorized account.

params.account: address of the account to revoke access for
params.methodSignature: function / method signature (4 byte keccak256 hash of the method selector)

grantAccess(bytes32,bytes4,address).notice: Grant access to an account to call a specific method on a specific asset.

hasAccess(bytes32,bytes4,address).notice: Check whether an account is allowed to call a specific method on a specific asset.

hasRootAccess(bytes32,address).notice: Check whether an account has root access for a specific asset.

revokeAccess(bytes32,bytes4,address).notice: Revoke access for an account to call a specific method on a specific asset.
